description: Gets the roles for an identity pool. You must use Amazon Web Services developer credentials to call this operation.

parameters.name: IdentityPoolId
parameters.description: An identity pool ID in the format REGION:GUID.

nested_items.name: IdentityPoolId
nested_items.description: An identity pool ID in the format REGION:GUID.

nested_items.name: RoleMappings
nested_items.description: How users for a specific identity provider are to mapped to roles. This is a String-to-  RoleMapping object map. The string identifies the identity provider, for example, graph.facebook.com or cognito-idp.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/us-east-1_abcdefghi:app_client_id.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The role mapping type. Token will use cognito:roles and cognito:preferred_role claims from the Cognito identity provider token to map groups to roles. Rules will attempt to match claims from the token to map to a role.

nested_items.name: AmbiguousRoleResolution
nested_items.description: If you specify Token or Rules as the Type, AmbiguousRoleResolution is required.

nested_items.name: RulesConfiguration
nested_items.description: The rules to be used for mapping users to roles.

nested_items.name: Rules
nested_items.description: An array of rules. You can specify up to 25 rules per identity provider.

nested_items.name: Claim
nested_items.description: The claim name that must be present in the token, for example, 'isAdmin' or 'paid'.

nested_items.name: MatchType
nested_items.description: The match condition that specifies how closely the claim value in the IdP token must match Value.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A brief string that the claim must match, for example, 'paid' or 'yes'.
